title: Urban Spirit Austin Soul!
posting_body: Text 9906B to my cell for more info!
Riverside offers up an eclectic and extraordinary Eastside living experience stitched into the urban fabric of Austin.
Dramatic, refined, and distinctive,  Riverside redefines East Austin modern luxury living, providing residents with an indulgent array of amenities.
Enjoy the ultimate relaxation with a resort-style swimming pool featuring a tanning ledge and expansive pool deck area.
Condition your mind, body, and soul in the tech-focused fitness center, offering virtual classes and boasting a dedicated yoga and spin studio.
Take advantage of the covered outdoor kitchen area with gas grilling stations, bar-top seating, gaming lawns, and picnic tables.
WFH in style with a sophisticated business lounge featuring a private conference room and break-out spaces.
That’s only the start, click here for a complete list of community amenities.
Unrivaled apartment amenities start at the front door of your one-, two-, or three-bedroom home.
Open-concept floor plans offer up to 12’ ceilings and 8’ entryways leading to sophisticated wood-style flooring in living areas.
Designer inspired kitchens offer energy efficient stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, glass subway tile backsplashes, and a kitchen island with pendant lighting.
Experience the serenity of a spa-inspired bathroom featuring large framed mirrors, modern lighting and hardware, and oversized walk-in closets.
Click here for a full list of apartment amenities.
